channel.title: Trade Glitch
channel.description: Is it possible to rid your server of the trade glitch? By trade glitch I mean that when two people are trading, and the server lags, they lose their stuff that was in trade. If you can help,please respond.

item.title: Trade Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Nuller Nuller
item.description:
@Nuller wrote:

There might be an error in ur server and client.
Be sure to compile and see if there are any errors

Read full topic

Is it possible to rid your server of the trade glitch?
